column1: All emissions (CO2e) are totalled by month and year, and detailed by land mgmt unit (i.e., field) and livestock animal group.
Daily calculated emissions are summed to monthly and annual emissions. Annual emissions reported on the basis of allocation (Table 17)
are highlighted green, while all other annual values are prorated by month or day (i.e., Emissionmonth = Emissionannual/12) are highlighted in red.
